articles.title: ‘Silent Spreaders’ May Be Responsible For Half Of U.S. COVID-19 Cases - Scary Mommy
articles.description: Silent spreaders include asymptomatic carriers and people with COVID-19 symptoms in the days before they start showing signs of illness.
articles.content:
mathisworks/Getty

articles.title: Here's what we know about the link between blood types and COVID-19 - KHOU.com

articles.content:
